mapper.insert:
insert into db_proxy.sardine_acceptancebill
uuid,
billNumber,
sourceBillNumber,
sourceBillType,
wrhuuid,
customeruuid,
acceptanceReason,
deliverySystem,
deliveryType,
totalCaseQtyStr,
totalAlcCaseQtyStr,
totalAmount,
totalAlcAmount,
state,
companyUuid,
remark,
version, CREATEDTIME, CREATEDID, CREATEDCODE, CREATEDNAME, LASTMODIFYTIME, LASTMODIFYID, LASTMODIFYCODE, LASTMODIFYNAME,
#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{billNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sourceBillNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sourceBillType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{wrh.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{customer.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{acceptanceReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{deliverySystem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{deliveryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{totalCaseQtyStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{alcTotalCaseQtyStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{totalAlcAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{companyUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{version,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{createInfo.time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createInfo.operator.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createInfo.operator.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createInfo.operator.fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyInfo.time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifyInfo.operator.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyInfo.operator.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyInfo.operator.fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update: update db_proxy.sardine_acceptanceBill set sourceBillNumber = #{sourceBillNumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sourceBillType = #{sourceBillType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customeruuid = #{customer.uuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wrhuuid = #{wrh.uuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, acceptanceReason = #{acceptanceReason, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deliverySystem = #{deliverySystem, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deliveryType = #{deliveryType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, totalCaseQtyStr = #{totalCaseQtyStr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, totalAlcCaseQtyStr = #{totalAlcCaseQtyStr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, totalAmount = #{totalAmount, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, totalAlcAmount = #{totalAlcAmount, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, state = #{state, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deliveryType = #{deliveryType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LASTMODIFYTIME = #{lastModifyInfo.time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LASTMODIFYID = #{lastModifyInfo.operator.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LASTMODIFYCODE = #{lastModifyInfo.operator.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LASTMODIFYNAME = #{lastModifyInfo.operator.fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version, jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} + 1 where uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and version = #{version, jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
mapper.select: select t.*, w.code wrhcode, w.name wrhname, c.code customerCode, c.name customerName from db_proxy.sardine_acceptanceBill t, db_proxy.sardine_wrh w, db_proxy.sardine_customer c where t.wrhuuid = w.uuid and t.customeruuid = c.uuid and t.uuid = #{uuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select t.*, w.code wrhcode, w.name wrhname, c.code customerCode, c.name customerName from db_proxy.sardine_acceptanceBill t, db_proxy.sardine_wrh w, db_proxy.sardine_customer c where t.wrhuuid = w.uuid and t.customeruuid = c.uuid and t.billnumber = #{billNumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.companyUuid = #{companyUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into db_proxy.sardine_acceptanceBillItem( uuid, line, acceptanceBillUuid, articleuuid, supplieruuid, binCode, containerBarCode, productionDate, validDate, qpcStr, munit, qty, caseQtyStr, planQty, planCaseQtyStr, realQty, realCaseQtyStr, price, amount ) values( #{uuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{line, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{acceptanceBillUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{article.uuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplier.uuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{binCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{containerBarCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productionDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{validDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{qpcStr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{munit, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{caseQtyStr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planQty, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{planCaseQtyStr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realQty, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{realCaseQtyStr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )
mapper.select: select t.* from db_proxy.sardine_acceptanceBill t where t.uuid = (select ti.acceptanceBillUuid from db_proxy.sardine_acceptanceBillItem ti where ti.uuid = #{itemUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select t.*, a.code articlecode, a.name articlename,s.code suppliercode,s.name suppliername,a.spec articleSpec from db_proxy.sardine_acceptanceBillItem t, db_proxy.sardine_article a, db_proxy.sardine_supplier s where t.articleuuid = a.uuid and t.supplieruuid=s.uuid and t.acceptanceBillUuid = #{acceptanceBillUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
